mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM BOOKACCOUNT B JOIN MEMBER M ON B.ID = M.ID JOIN BANKBOOK BB ON B.BOOKNUM = BB.BOOKNUM WHERE B.ACCOUNTNUM = #{accountNum}
mapper.update: UPDATE BOOKACCOUNT SET ACCOUNT=#{account}, ACCOUNTPASSWORD=#{accountPassword}, ACCOUNTBALANCE=#{accountBalance} WHERE ACCOUNTNUM=#{accountNum}
